title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function in the file menu does not work consistently. Specifically, after closing all editors and creating a new file (f1.txt), selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 
2. Close all editors. 
3. Create a new file (f1.txt). 
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
